column4: AMD (ATI) is years behind nVidia in terms of reliability, support, and features. ATI graphics cards chug severely on even the most powerful Linux systems.
Is nobody here familiar with what daemon Ubuntu runs that makes all those obnoxious system alert sounds? I want them gone for ever and ever and ever...
go intel, if performance in mind, go AMD, both support open source
You're so incredibly wrong! Drakeson: don't listen to what dli is saying...
